Functions
Add_Member
int Add_Member(
Member_credentials *ADHERANT_CREDENTIALS,
Member_infos *ADHERANT_INFOS
)

It adds a new member to the club by writing into The credentials and infos databases.

Parameters
ADHERANT_CREDENTIALS
Member_credentials*

The structure of the members which will be holding the new credentials when the user tries to sign up.

ADHERANT_INFOS
Member_infos*

The structure of the members which will be holding the new infos.i.e: "Firstname ,Adress , Phonenumber..."

Returns
If the memeber is an Admin

Returns 1

If not

Returns 0

See Also

Credentials_Input / Infos_Input

Sign_In_Member
int Sign_In_Member(
Member_credentials *ADHERANT_CREDENTIALS,
Member_infos *ADHERANT_INFOS
)

It prompts The user to enter his/her login and password to sign in and compare the input to the actual database.

It Hides the password while input and Decrypt it to compare it's instance in the database.

Parameters
ADHERANT_CREDENTIALS
Member_credentials*

The structure of the members which will be holding the new credentials when the user tries to sign up.

ADHERANT_INFOS
Member_infos*

The structure of the members which will be holding the new infos.i.e: "Firstname ,Adress , Phonenumber..."

Returns
If the login and the password is correct

Returns 1

If not

Returns 0

See Also

HIDE_PASSWORD / Decrypt_Password

Modify_Or_Delete_Member
int Modify_Or_Delete_Member(
char Delete_Modify,
Member_credentials *ADHERANT_CREDENTIALS,
Member_infos *ADHERANT_INFOS
)

This functions is used on Double mode especially to interact with the member infos and Credentials Databases:

Delete Mode

It deletes a specific member from the The Database.

Modification Mode

It modifies a specific membere in the Database

Parameters
Delete_Modify
char

It denotes The mode which will the function be used in i.e: "D" for delete /"M" for modify

ADHERANT_CREDENTIALS
Member_credentials*

The structure of the members which will be holding the new credentials when the user tries to sign up.

ADHERANT_INFOS
Member_infos*

The structure of the members which will be holding the new infos.i.e: "Firstname ,Adress , Phonenumber..."

Returns
If the memeber is an Admin

Returns 1

If not

Returns 0

See Also

CHANGE_OR_DELETE_DATABASE_LINE / CHANGE_OR_DELETE_INFOS_LINE / Credentials_Input / Infos_Input / SEARCH_ID

Member_Alpha_Display
void Member_Alpha_Display()

This functions is used to display the Members in alphabetical order :

It proceeds by storing all the Logins in a Dynamic Structure array , After the array is completely filled The sorting algorithm takes its turn to sort the array lexicographically , and the we simply display the array elements

See Also

linecount / nullcheck
